casebody.data:
Allen Industries, Inc., Appellant, v. American Hair and Felt Company, Appellee.Gen. No. 40,517.

(Abstract of Decision.)

Heard in second division, first district, this court at December term, 1938;opinion filed May 28, 1940.Chapman & Cutler, for appellant; Dayton Ogden, of counsel; Hopkins, Sutter, Halls & DeWolfe, for appellee; Lines, Spooner & Quarles, Donald J. DeWolfe and William G. Blood, of counsel. Opinion by Presiding Justice John J. Sullivan.

“Not to be published in full.”
